original_text: And the anger of the Lord was hot against Israel, and he delivered them into the hands of spoilers that spoiled them, and he sold them into the hands of their enemies round about, so that they could not any longer stand before their enemies.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이스라엘에게 진노하사 노략하는 자의 손에 넘겨 주사 그들이 노략을 당하게 하시며 또 주위에 있는 모든 대적의 손에 팔아 넘기시매 그들이 다시는 대적을 당하지 못하였으며

sentences.original_text: And the anger of the Lord was hot against Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주의 진노가 이스라엘을 향하여 뜨거워졌으며

sentences.original_text: and he delivered them into the hands of spoilers
and he sold them into the hands of their enemies round about
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 사방에 있는 원수들의 손에 팔았으니

sentences.original_text: so that they could not any longer stand before their enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 더 이상 원수들 앞에 서지 못하게 되었습니다
